dcterms:creator: Jae Shin Yoon
Kihwan Kim
Orazio Gallo

dcterms:description: The NVIDIA Dataset contains 9 scenes simultaneously captured by 12 cameras on a static camera rig, used to simulate monocular input videos for dynamic view synthesis.
dcterms:title: NVIDIA Dataset

dcterms:creator: F. Perazzi
J. Pont-Tuset
B. McWilliams
L. Van Gool
M. Gross
A. Sorkine-Hornung
dcterms:description: The DAVIS Dataset is a benchmark dataset and evaluation methodology for video object segmentation, providing a set of videos with annotated object masks.
dcterms:title: DAVIS Dataset
